title: help
body: so i got the leaver buster for 5 games when my computers internet service restarted my computer and i was able to still get back into the game it kicked me out of and finished the match, please tell me how i can have the leaver buster be taken off i got 20 nminutes 5 times for no reason :(

replies.body:
Leaverbuster penalties are unable to be added to an account for no reason. If you see a penalty, it means that there was a **recent and consistent trend of disconnections** on the account. We're unable to remove these penalties for any reason, as your absence from a match negatively impacts **everyone**, regardless of your intent.

If you're having issues with your internet service, it may be a good idea to reach out to your ISP's technical support and hold off on playing further matches until the issue has been resolved. If you have any questions, let me know.
